Class AbstractEventSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.janusproject.kernel.space.SpaceBase
      • io.janusproject.kernel.space.AbstractEventSpace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DistributedSpace, NetworkService.NetworkEventReceivingListener, Space, EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EventSpaceImpl, RestrictedAccessEventSpaceImpl

    public abstract class AbstractEventSpace
extends SpaceBase
    Abstract implementation of an event space.

    2.0.1.0 2014-10-16 21:50:58
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Nicolas Gaud, Stéphane Galland

    Maven Artifact Id:

      • emit

        public final void emit(Event event,
        Scope<Address> scope)
        Emit the given event in the given scope.

        This function emits on the internal event bus of the agent (call to doEmit(Event, Scope)), and on the network.

        Parameters:
        event - - the event to emit.
        scope - - description of the scope of the event, i.e. the receivers of the event.
        See Also:
        emit(Event)

      • emit

        public final void emit(Event event)
        Emit the given event.

        This function emits on the internal event bus of the agent (call to doEmit(Event, Scope)), and on the network.

        Parameters:
        event - - the event to emit.
        See Also:
        emit(Event, Scope)

      • doEmit

        protected void doEmit(Event event,
          Scope<? super Address> scope)
        Do the emission of the event.

        This function emits the event only on the internal event bus of the agents.

        Parameters:
        event - - the event to emit.
        scope - - description of the scope of the event, i.e. the receivers of the event.

                 Event event)

        space - - the id of the space.
